Title: Establishes the fibroid study fund
Summary: Establishes the fibroid study fund to expend moneys to the department of health to study fibroids, the treatment of fibroids, potential barriers to the access of treatment for fibroids, and differences in symptoms and access to treatment for women of color.
LawCode: Add ยง87, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the fibroid study fund
